detail_desc: Baby Exclusive. Short-sleeved shirt in a soft, organic cotton weave. Wrapover front with a concealed press-stud at one side and ties at the other.
Wide trousers in sturdy jersey with a high waist, zip fly, concealed hook-and-eye fastening and straight legs with inset panels for extra width.

Set with a hat and mittens in a soft cable knit containing some wool. Hat with a faux fur pompom on top, earflaps and ties under the chin. Mittens with foldover ribbing. Both hat and mittens have a fleece lining.
Shirt in an airy viscose weave with a grandad collar, French front, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and rounded hem. Slim fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.
Metal earrings in various designs, some decorated with glass rhinestones and one pair with pearly plastic beads. The zinc content of the earrings is recycled.
Hairbands in a cotton weave with a decorative bow at the front and elastication at the back.
Top in a crêpe weave with a V-neck and pleat at the top that creates a gentle drape. Opening at the back with a button at the back of the neck. Slightly longer at the back.

Shorts in woven fabric. High waist with covered elastication at the back and pleats at the front, a zip fly and concealed hook-and-eye fasteners. Diagonal side pockets, fake back pockets and wide legs. The pocket linings are made from recycled polyester.
Jumper in a soft knit containing some wool with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

5-pocket jeans in washed, stretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button and skinny legs. Shaping – denim with a stretch function that holds in and shapes the waist, thighs and bum while keeping the jeans in shape.
T-shirt in cotton jersey with a print motif. Ribbing around the neckline.
Long-sleeved bodysuits in soft, organic cotton jersey with lapped shoulders and press-studs at the crotch.
All-in-one suit in soft, patterned organic cotton velour with a hood and appliqué at the top. Zip down the front that continues along one leg, and ribbing at the cuffs and hems.
Fitted, single-breasted jacket in woven fabric. Fastening with one button at the front, a decorative button at the cuffs and a seam at the hem with a gently flared peplum. Lined.
Fitted, knee-length dress in a fine knit with a slight sheen. Boat neck, long sleeves with scalloped edges, and a scalloped hem. Unlined.

Long, crêpe-weave dress in a narrow cut at the top with an opening at the front and short, narrow shoulder straps that fasten at the back of the neck. Decorative appliqués on the front, an opening and concealed zip at the back, a seam at the waist and gathered skirt. Lined.
Cap in a cotton weave with concealed elastication at the back.
T-shirt in jersey with a motif.
Oversized blouse in woven fabric with a V-neck and ties at the neckline. Long balloon sleeves with broderie anglaise and narrow cuffs with press-stud fastenings.

Shirt in an airy, patterned viscose and cotton weave with a turn-down collar, French front and yoke at the back. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slim Fit – a fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.
Baby Exclusive. Long-sleeved tops in soft, pointelle-knit organic cotton jersey with a button placket and embroidered scalloped trim around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Fully lined mesh bikini bottoms with a low waist and high cut at the back.
Loafers with cut-out sections at the sides, satin linings, imitation leather insoles and rubber soles. Heel 3 cm.
Sandals with wide, crossover straps, square toes and low heels. Satin linings, imitation leather insoles and rubber soles. Heel 1.5 cm.
Shirt in an airy cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front and an open chest pocket. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a gently rounded hem.

Straight shirt jacket in soft fabric with a collar and press-studs down the front. Flap chest pockets with a press-stud, front pockets, gently dropped shoulders, long sleeves and cuffs with a press stud. Unlined.
Dance shoes with elastic straps over the foot. Cotton linings and insoles and soft suede soles.
Off-the-shoulder blouse in woven fabric with elastication around the top and short sleeves.
Short-sleeved shirt in premium cotton with a turn-down collar, French front and rounded hem. Slim fit with an accentuated waist and narrow shoulders to create a fitted silhouette.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a shimmering motif on the front and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Rod-shaped metal earrings with hoop pendants underneath. Length 4.5 cm.

Trousers in stretch cotton twill with a zip fly and button and covered elastication at the hems. Diagonal side pockets, welt back pockets and flap leg pockets with press-studs. Slim Fit – a fit that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a fitted silhouette.
Straight-cut top in slub cotton jersey. Short sleeves with an opening with lacing.

Biker jacket in imitation suede with imitation leather details, a small stand-up collar and quilted details on the shoulders. Diagonal zip down the front and a zip at the cuffs. Three zipped front pockets. Lined.
Patterned swimsuit with a frill at the top and narrow shoulder straps with decorative bows. Lined at the front.
Cardigan in a soft, loose knit with dolman sleeves, close-fitting cuffs and a rounded hem. No buttons.
Dress in sturdy jersey made from a cotton blend with a round neckline, short sleeves, side pockets and a detachable, braided belt.

Suit trousers in a woven wool blend with a concealed hook-and-eye fastening and zip fly. Side pockets, jetted back pockets with a button, and legs with creases. Slim fit that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a fitted silhouette. For the matching jacket, look for: 0699149.
Skirt in two tiers of sequined tulle with a glittery elastic waistband. Satin lining.

Shirt in woven fabric with an easy-iron finish. Turn-down collar, classic front and darts and a yoke at the back. Long sleeves, narrow cuffs with adjustable buttoning, and a rounded hem. Slim Fit – a fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.

Softshell jacket in water-repellent functional fabric. Hood with an elastic drawstring and small peak, and a zip down the front with a chin guard. Chest pocket with a zip and earphone outlet on the inside, zipped side pockets, elastication at the cuffs and an elastic drawstring at the hem. Thermal fleece inside. Size of chest pocket approx. 12x17 cm.
5-pocket jeans in washed denim with hard-worn details, a regular waist and zip fly and button. Tapered legs with raw-edge hems.
Relaxed-fit top in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with dropped shoulders and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Sandals in grained leather with adjustable straps with metal buckles and concealed elastication. Adjustable heel strap with a hook and loop fastening and a loop at the back. Moulded suede insoles and fluted rubber soles.
Sunglasses with metal frames, plastic details and UV-protective, tinted lenses.
Short top in an airy weave with narrow, tie-top shoulder straps and a small frill trim a the top.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a mid waist, medium coverage at the back and laser-cut, scalloped edges.
Baby Exclusive. Sun hat in a soft weave lined in a cotton weave. Ties under the chin (not in size 0-4M).

Puffer jacket in windproof, water-repellent functional fabric with a lined, drawstring hood and taped zip down the front. Side pockets with a taped zip, an inner pocket, ribbed cuffs and concealed, covered elastication at the hem. Polyester filling.

Calf-length, A-line dress in a crêpe weave with an opening and button at the back of the neck. Short puff sleeves with narrow elastication at the hems, and gathered seams at the waist and hips for added width and soft draping. Jersey lining.
Adjustable elastic braces with imitation leather details and metal fasteners.
Knee-high, jacquard-knit sports socks in fast -drying functional fabric with elasticated tops.
Fine-knit cardigan in soft cotton with a round neck, sequins on the front and shimmering buttons.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with ribbing around the neckline and a motif.
Sleeveless top in hole-patterned, jacquard-knit jersey with narrow shoulder straps, a small frill trim and elastication at the top and hem.

Baby Exclusive. Dungarees in soft, organic cotton corduroy with buttons at the sides and straps with adjustable buttoning at the front. Elastication at the back of the waist, and elasticated hems. Concealed press-studs at the crotch and down the legs (except in sizes 1½-4Y). Lined at the top.
Lined triangle bikini top with removable inserts, a decorative ring at the front, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Soft, non-wired bra in microfibre with adjustable shoulder straps and padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Hook-and-eye fastening at the back.

Short, fitted dress in woven fabric with short cap sleeves and a concealed zip at the back with a safety button at the top. Seam at the waist and a slightly stretchy skirt with a slit at the back. Lined.

Baby Exclusive. Set with a dress and pair of puff pants in a pattern-weave linen and cotton blend. Sleeveless dress with buttons at the back and frilled shoulder straps that cross at the back. Unlined. Puff pants with an elasticated waist, single frill at the front, three frills at the back and elasticated hems.
Fitted top in ribbed jersey with a turtle neck and short sleeves.
Long-sleeved top in mesh made from a cotton blend in a relaxed fit with a yoke at the top, ribbing around the neckline and slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Short 5-pocket shorts in washed denim with worn details and a smart stretch function so that the shorts embrace the body for a comfortable and flattering fit. High waist, zip fly and skinny legs.
Lightweight sports boxer shorts in fast-drying, breathable, functional fabric with an elasticated waist and slightly longer legs.
Double-layered hat in soft, rib-knit cotton jersey with a small appliqué on the front.
Pyjamas in soft satin. V-neck top with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and lace at the top. Straight, wide bottoms with an elasticated waist.
Thin metal hoop earrings. Diameter 6 cm.
Wide, fabric-covered Alice band with a knot detail on the top.

Suit trousers in superstretch fabric made from a wool blend woven in a special way to make it more crease-resistant. Hook-and-eye fastening and a zip fly, side pockets, jetted back pockets with a button and tapered legs with creases. Slim Fit – a fit that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a fitted silhouette.
5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed denim with a high waist and gently tapered legs with raw-edge hems.

V-neck tunic in an airy viscose weave with a small frilled collar and long sleeves with decorative pleats and narrow buttoned cuffs. Seams with decorative pleats and a flounce at the hem. V-neck jersey underdress. Relaxed fit.
Jumper in a soft knit with dropped shoulders and wide sleeves.
KIDS EXCLUSIVE. Cardigan in organic cotton sweatshirt fabric with a soft, brushed inside. Jersey-lined hood, buttons down the front and long sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.
Blouse in an airy weave with a round neckline with an opening and concealed button at the back of the neck, and 3/4-length, trumpet sleeves.
Short-sleeved, fitted jersey top with a slightly deeper neckline.
Short jumper in a soft, rib knit with a small stand-up collar and long sleeves.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a mid waist and cutaway coverage at the back.

Straight-cut coat in a felted wool blend with a high, stand-up collar with concealed press-studs. Zip and wind flap down the front and zipped side pockets. Lined. The wool content of the coat is recycled.
Fitted top in mesh with a round neckline and long sleeves.
